Class AddOrModifyDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog
              • dialogs.AddOrModifyDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class AddOrModifyDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    A dialog that extends JDialog , used for adding a new record or modifying an existing one. Enables add or modify operations underlying SQL data.
    Author:
    Jelena, Marko
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • tab

        private SchemaTab tab
        SchemaTab to which this dialog is created.

      • inputs

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,javax.swing.JComponent> inputs
        Map which contains Column code as key and JComponent as its value. Every Column has it's own JComponent

      • hm

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> hm
        Map which contains Column code as key and Object as its value. Represents conditions under which are some JComponent fields filled.

      • recordValues

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> recordValues
        Values returned from RecordsManagement. All values except images. Used for setting specific value to non image field.

      • recordImages

        private java.util.ArrayList<byte[]> recordImages
        Values returned from RecordsManagement. Only image values. Used for setting specific value to image field.

      • addButton

        private javax.swing.JButton addButton

      • errorLabelMap

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,javax.swing.JLabel> errorLabelMap
        Maps Column names to error labels that contain validation errors.

      • verifiers

        private java.util.List<AbstractInputVerifier> verifiers
        List of all verifiers present on the dialog. On each validation change, accept button status is set. If all fields are valid, accept button is enabled, disable otherwise.

      • verificationCallback

        private VerifierCallback verificationCallback
        Instance of anonymous private class that will implement the callback interface.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AddOrModifyDialog

        public AddOrModifyDialog(SchemaTab tab,
                         java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> hm,
                         TypesOfActions toa)
        Constructor for AddOrModifyDialog. Depending on table columns, he dinamically creates different types of fields: JTextField, JComboBox, JLabel, JFileChooser or JDateChooser If TypesOfActions is ADD, he doesn't set values to those fields If TypesOfActions is MODIFY, he set values to those fields depending on map of Primary Keys
        Parameters:
        tab - in which tab we call this dialog (from tab we get table, selected row..)
        hm - map of Primary Keys for getting and setting values to different field types
        toa - type of possible action (ADD or MODIFY)
